messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Writer's Base Juliet, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We detected the Space Station 13 is passing through a really dense cloud of mimeotrox and we are sending an emergency shuttle right away.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.
